location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Sketch Map of South-West Haycock Island

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: Manuscript; coloured ink, pencil and crayon on paper.Dimensions: 333 x 208mm.

mods.abstract: Sketch map drawn on India Office minute paper, depicting South-West Haycock Island, the Hanish Islands, Jebel Zukur Island [JazÄ«rat Jabal Zuqar], and other islands in the Lower Red Sea. The coasts of Eritrea and Yemen are shown on the west and east side of the Red Sea respectively. South-West Haycock Island is circled in pencil. Author unknown.
